page.title: 03The Vicar
page.content: Rev Paul Bell has recently arrived in the parish of East Winch and we thought it would be interesting to find out his thoughts on his new job and the area. Rev Bell grew up in Newcastle_upon_Tyne. Then he went into the army. After some time he left the army and decided to go to Africa to teach french. He taught there for twenty years in a place called Brande. He had decided to become a minister in the Church of England and returned to a church in North London where he was the curate. Then he came to Middleton and East Winch in June 1985 to become the vicar.
